easy.question: How do you get a music disc?
choices: in loot chests at y=-1 in the void
when a creeper is killed by a skeleton
when a skeleton is killed by a creeper
when a zombie is summoned by a griefer

easy.question: How do you break obsidian
choices: with a wooden pick -- its easy

easy.question: How do you get a grass block
choices: with a tool enchanted with silk touch
